name: ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair
Template Name: ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair

name: Detail - Dimensions of concrete breakout on bridge deck must be agreed with the CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Dimensions at top deck and deck soffit agreed upon
Detail - Contractor must provide a list of all proposed repair construction materials with any technical data sheets available for each material for CPS Engineer approval.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - List of all materials and technical data sheets
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect the areas broken out to inspect surface edge preparation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 45° taper cut on all 4 edges, no damage to existing reinforcement and shear cleat.
Detail - Exposed and accessible (top and bottom) reinforcing steel must be power tool cleaned to SSPC SP3 standard. Other areas cleaned to SSPC SP2 standard.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - SSPC SP3 and SP2 standard.
Detail - HD10 longitudinal bars to comply to design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all new and existing reinforcement bars are coated with a cement-based polymer modified coating material containing silica fume. Ensure all surfaces are fully coated
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked straight bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked bent bar, embedded minimum 150mm, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked bent bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked straight bar, embedded minimum 150mm with chemset, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect placement of reinforcing steel after it is fixed in position
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Hooked bars tied with 2mm wire as per construction drawings
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Insecption Record & Photos
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect formwork before casting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - Forms must have sufficient rigidity and strength to prevent distortion due to pressure from the concrete. Formwork to remain in place until concrete reaches a compressive strength of 30MPa
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Insecption Record & Photos
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure exposed concrete edges are free from dust and loose particles
Detail - Site Engineer to witness casting of concrete deck repair
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - All concrete used in deck repair must be in compliance with T-CES 101. Surface finish in accordance with NZS 3114. Deck top surface - U3. Exposed soffit of deck - F5.
Detail - Contractor to provide minimum of 9 concrete cubes for laboratory material compressive testing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Minimum compressive strength of:
○ Patchroc C (Fosroc) or equivalent should be used.
○ All concrete supplied shall comply with NZS 3109
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Contractor to provide details of the proposed measures intended to protect the concrete during curing
Detail - Prior to resurfacing, CPS Engineer to inspect the newly cast deck repair and make the decision whether crack injection is required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Crack injection required if crack between newly cast concrete and existing deck exceeds 0.3mm
Detail - Road surfacing reinstated to be consistent with rest of deck surfacing (Grade 3/5 racked in Chipseal). Contractor to provide methodology for resurfacing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Detail - Upon completion of works, Site Engineer to inspect works to confirm it is completed to required standard for sign off
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Signatures from Site and CPS Engineers
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
18 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
ITP - C1503B - Mautaua Under Slip - Master ITP
Template Name: ITP - C1503B - Mautaua Under Slip - Master ITP

name: 1 - Confirm Solution is Appropriate for the Site
Detail - Confirm the applicability of the solution for the site
Frequency - Prior to commencement of construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - To be confirmed by the CPS Engineer/Geotechnical Engineer
Detail - Once all ESC controls have been installed & the Tree Felling & Vegetation Clearance has been carried out
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Confirm buttress extents and rock armouring toe extents
Frequency - At completion of topsoil strip, before Toe construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the Geotechnical Design Manager
Conformance Criteria - Buttress dimensions to be confirmed by CPS Engineer, including toe dimensions and placement.
Detail - Confirm Buttress foundation to be on suitable natural ground
Frequency - At completion of site clearing and foundation excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the CPS Engineer
Conformance Criteria - Foundation to be suitable natural ground
Detail - Confirm Slope face is 2H:1V if its required to be as steep as 1.5H:1V CPS Engineer approval is required
Frequency - At completion of clearing and foundation excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the CPS Engineer
Detail - Bulk fill to be approved by the Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Rock of GAP65, 100, or 150 grading. Broken faces.
Records - CS-4020 Bulk Fill Earthworks Record Check Sheet, material receipt
Detail - Rock Armour to be approved by the Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing

Conformance Criteria - Rock armour shall be hard, durable, crushed, quarried or natural stone free from dust, clay, organic matter and other deleterious material. the stone shall be free from laminations and cleavages and shall not disintegrate on exposure to weathering.
○ Rock to be SG 2,350kg with a D50 of 450mm
8 - Mega Flow Strip Drain or Drainage Blanket
Detail - If seepage is present in the slip scarp mega flow strip drain or a drainage blanket is required.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure Bidim complies with specification
Detail - Lay Bidim A39 geofabric over the slip between the existing ground and the bulk fill. Lay Bidim A49 between the bulk fill and the rock armouring.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure Bidim complies with specification
Detail - Check that the geofabric have been installed in accordance with the manufacturers specification - overlaps and pin centres
Frequency - On completion of geofabric installation before fill is placed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Use of the correct geotextile at back and base of cut - Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Class D placed at back and base of cut.
Detail - Filling carried out in fully drained conditions with no free water on the working surfaces. Any erosion to be repaired immediately
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection

Detail - Site Engineer to check embankment slopes for location, line and level as the fill progresses ensuring that batter faces are overfilled and trimmed back so that so that the fill is well compacted to the edge
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level to be worked through with CPS throughout layer installation
Detail - Fill placed in horizontal layers no greater than 300mm and compacted. Site Engineer to instruct lab when and where to carry out testing
Frequency - testing low middle and top of buttress
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and NDM Testing
Conformance Criteria - Fill shall be compacted in accordance with NZ4431: 2022
Detail - Use of the correct geotextile at back and base of cut - Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Class D placed at back and base of cut.
Detail - Check that the geofabric have been installed in accordance with the manufacturers specification - overlaps and pin centres
Frequency - On completion of geofabric installation before fill is placed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Use of the correct geogrid between slope face and rock armour- Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Bidim A49 placed between rock armour and slope face.

Detail - Ensure that placement of rock material is placed in such a manner to minimise segregation and avoid displacement of underlying materials. Oversize rock to be placed such to minimise voids. CPS Engineer given notice to visually inspect initial placement of riprap material
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - CPS Engineer to be informed of unsuitable ground or seepage in Trench and instruct testing and remedial works.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS Engineer to instruct action
Detail - Location to be determined by CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Trenching location and direction to be confirmed by CPS Engineer
Detail - Ensure drainage outlet from pavement connects to buttress fill if required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Confirm drainage connection if required
Detail - Refer to Pavement and Surfacing ITP's
Detail - Ensure all subsoil drainage lines comply with design prior to carrying on with next construction process
Frequency - At completion of sub soil drainage line
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Delivery Dockets and Lab Testing Spreadsheet and Test Reports to be included in QA File
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
Records - Delivery Dockets, Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
ITP - G1202B - Waikare Riverbend SH38 - Network Drainage
Template Name: ITP - G1202B - Waikare Riverbend SH38 - Network Drainage

name: 1 - Locate existing services by hand digging/hydro excavation
Detail - Ensure all services conflicting with the line of trench has been exposed by hand digging/ hydro excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Potholing
Conformance Criteria - All conflicts have been located. New services and/or conflicts to be advised to Project Engineer. As-built all services
Detail - Inspect trench profile and ensure it is correct to minimum drainage standards
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level is correct
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Ensure trench width is sufficient to provide enough space on either side of the pipe
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - D/6 or 150mm whichever is greater on either side of the pipe
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Test formation level on completion of excavation to check if undercut required
Frequency - One test per 20 linear metres
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Scala Penetrometer
Conformance Criteria - If CBR is less than 50kPa , advise Engineer
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Bedding - Ensure correct thickness of bedding is placed and compacted
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 150 mm thick bedding for all mm dia pipe
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Confirm pipes diameter, class & jointing type as shown on the drawings, and that the pipes are correct and in good condition.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Pipe - Diameter & Class, Wingwalls, Manholes, Cesspits etc.
Detail - Pipe Laying - as only replacing section on outlet of existing pipe, grade is to follow existing levels
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Invert level following pre-existing grade
Detail - Inspect pipes prior to backfilling to ensure they have been installed correctly and the joints are in place. Check for gaps and/or defects and check pipe alignment for straightness
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - No defects/ gaps / pipes are aligned correctly
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements from Specifications
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - CLEAN GRADED GRANULAR AGGREGATE AND HAVE BROKEN FACES AP65

Detail - Backfill 150mm lifts with (material) and test every 300mm lift to underside of Subgrade alternatively, to 300mm above crown of pipe in berms. Remainder of backfill to be done with excavated material.
Frequency - 1 test per 20 m length of trench per 300mm lift
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing
Conformance Criteria - 97% (under carriageway) or 95% (under berm) of MDD or Clegg equivalent
Records - Clegg or NDM Test Results
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
15 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
